scripts.dev: concurrently -n api,cvf,interface,admin,site -c blue,magenta,green,red,yellow "pnpm --filter @azh/api dev" "pnpm --filter @azh/cvf dev" "pnpm --filter @azh/interface dev" "pnpm --filter @azh/admin dev" "pnpm --filter @azh/site dev"
scripts.dev:frontend: concurrently -n interface,admin,site -c green,red,yellow "pnpm --filter @azh/interface dev" "pnpm --filter @azh/admin dev" "pnpm --filter @azh/site dev"
